sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import Yearly from "./yearly"; import "../styleSheet.css"; class InputsValue extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { ctcValue: 0, rentValue: 0, deduction80C: 0, deduction80D: 0, stanDard: 0, taxableSalary: 0, baseSalary: 0, hraValue: 0, daValue: 0, totalEarned: 0, Appl_amount1: 0, TDS: 0, PT: 0, PF: 0, NetPay: 0, }; } getInputs = (e) => this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); oldTaxCalcuation = () => { let FirstSlab = 250000; let SecondSlab = 500000; let ctcValue = this.state.ctcValue; let rentValue = this.state.rentValue; let deduction80C = this.state.deduction80C; let deduction80D = this.state.deduction80D; let stanDard = this.state.stanDard; let taxableSalaryValue = ctcValue - rentValue - deduction80C - deduction80D - stanDard; let baseSalary = ctcValue / 2; let basicSalary_forHRA = baseSalary / 2; let daValue1 = ctcValue - (baseSalary + basicSalary_forHRA); let totalEarnedvalue = baseSalary + basicSalary_forHRA + daValue1; let TDS_value = 100; let PT_value = 100; let PF_value = 100; let netpay_value = totalEarnedvalue - (TDS_value + PT_value + PF_value); let Appl_amount1_value; if (taxableSalaryValue < FirstSlab) { Appl_amount1_value = taxableSalaryValue; } else { Appl_amount1_value = FirstSlab; } this.setState({ taxableSalary: taxableSalaryValue, baseSalary: baseSalary, hraValue: basicSalary_forHRA, daValue: daValue1, totalEarned: totalEarnedvalue, TDS: TDS_value, PT: PT_value, PF: PF_value, NetPay: netpay_value, }); }; render() { return (
Taxable Salary is : {this.state.taxableSalary}

Tax payabe as per Old slab

Tax slabs Tax Rate Applicable Amount Balance Amount Tax Amount
0-2,50,000 0% {this.state.baseSalary}
2,50,001-5,00,000 5%
5,00,001-10,000,00 20%
Above 10,00,000 30%
Sub Total
Surcharge
Health and Edu Cess
Tax credit (Sec 87A)
Total Tax payabe
Payable per month

Tax payabe as per new slab

Tax slabs Tax Rate Applicable Amount Balance Amount Tax Amount
0-2,50,000 0%
2,50,001-5,00,000 5%
5,00,001-7,50,000 10%
7,50,000 - 10,00,000 15%
10,00,001 - 12,50,000 20%
12,50,001 - 15,00,000 25%
Above 15,00,001 30%
Sub Total
Surcharge
Health and Edu Cess
Tax Credit (Sec 87A)
Total Tax payable
); } } export default InputsValue;
